description.zh-CN: 空灵过渡空间风格，代表两个状态之间的存在。创造不安定但引人思考的氛围、心理学感受和超现实感。模糊过渡空间设计代表两个状态之间的存在。创造心理模糊和冥想氛围。
description.en-US: Ambiguous transitional space design representing existence between two states Creates unsettling yet beautiful interfaces inspired by liminal space aesthetic: empty corridors, abandoned buildings, and in-between moments for unsettling, contemplative aesthetics Creates unique, unsettling aesthetic spaces Perfect for experimental art, game environments, and contemplative applications This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. psychological ambiguity and contemplative atmosphere. Delivers exceptional visual quality and sophisticated design excellence.
